item.description:
@Zenzie wrote:

search

/object click one/

add under it

case ID NUMBER: if(playerHasItemAmount(..., 1) && playerHasItemAmount(..., 1) && playerHasItemAmount(., 1) && playerHasItemAmount(..., 1) && playerHasItemAmount(.., 1) && playerHasItemAmount(.., 1)) { teleportToX = ..; teleportToY = ..; heightLevel = ...; } else { sendMessage("You need a tinderbox , abyssal whip , magic shortbow to use this!")

Just an example just edit stuff a bit

item.title: Items needed be4 u can open chest !?
item.dc:creator: @Zenzie Zenzie
item.description:
@Zenzie wrote:

This is you need to use item on it if thats ok for you â€¦

Search

else if(useItemID == 2363 && atObjectID == 2783)//rune { initSmithing(2363); flushOutStream();

Add under it

else if(useItemID == 1523 && atObjectID == 2193)  
{
sendMessage("You get your startertools"); //msg to player 
startAnimation(2246); //animiation on chest
stillgfx(332, absY, absX); //puple glow on chest
deleteItem(1523,getItemSlot(1523), 1); //removes item use on chest
addItem(4151,1);  //starter gear
	addItem(6106,1);  //starter gear 
	addItem(6107,1);  //starter gear
	addItem(6108,1);  //starter gear
	addItem(6109,1);  //starter gear
	addItem(6110,1);  //starter gear 
	addItem(6568,1);  //starter gear
	addItem(995,500000);  //starter gear
	}

Thats an example

[size=15pt]STEP 2 [/size]

if(playerHasItemAmount(..., 1) && playerHasItemAmount(..., 1) && playerHasItemAmount(., 1) && playerHasItemAmount(..., 1) && playerHasItemAmount(.., 1) && playerHasItemAmount(.., 1)) { teleportToX = ..; teleportToY = ..; heightLevel = ...; } else { sendMessage("You need *ITEMS* to use this!")
